item.title: George Christodoulou
item.description: Georgios (George) Christodoulou I received my diploma in Computer Science and Engineering from the Computer Science and Engineering Department of the University of Ioannina in 2017. I received my MSc in Computer Science with specialization in software from the Computer Science and Engineering Department of the University of Ioannina in 2020. I received my PhD from the Computer Science and Engineering Department of the University of Ioannina in 2023, supervised by Prof.
